title: Breaded Air Fryer Pork Chops Recipe
description: These breaded pork chops made in the air fryer turn out perfectly tender and juicy in just 10 minutes. Try different crouton flavors for variety.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe:¬†Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond Recipes Main Dishes Pork Pork Chop Recipes Breaded Air Fryer Pork Chops 4.7 (90) 72 Reviews 17 Photos These breaded pork chops, made in the air fryer, are perfectly tender and juicy. They require basic pantry ingredients and take just 10 minutes to cook. I like to use a Misto sprayer with my own oil, but feel free to use regular cooking spray. Submitted by France C Updated on November 14, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 17 17 17 17 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 10 mins Total Time: 20 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 4 (5 ounce) boneless, center-cut pork chops, 1-inch thick 1 teaspoon Cajun seasoning 1 ¬Ω cups cheese and garlic croutons 2 large eggs cooking spray Directions Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Place pork chops on a plate and season both sides with Cajun seasoning. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Pulse croutons in a small food processor until fine; transfer to a shallow dish. Lightly beat eggs in a separate shallow dish. Working one at a time, dip pork chops into beaten egg, letting excess drip off; press into crouton breading to coat both sides and place breaded chop, unstacked, onto a plate. Repeat with remaining chops. Mist chops with cooking spray. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray and arrange chops in a single layer in the air fryer basket. You may have to do two batches depending on the size of your air fryer. Cook in the preheated air fryer for 5 minutes; flip chops and mist again with cooking spray if there are dry areas. Cook 5 minutes more. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center of the chops should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Serve hot and enjoy! DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS¬† Recipe Tips Play around with different flavors of croutons for variety.Keep chops warm in an oven on the lowest setting while air frying the remaining chops.For thicker chops, add an extra minute to the cook time. For thinner chops, cook 1 minute less. Editor's Note: Nutrition data for this recipe includes the full amount of breading ingredients. The actual amount consumed will vary. Please note the differences in ingredient amounts and cooking temperature when using the magazine version of this recipe. I Made It Print 184 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 327 Calories 15g Fat 10g Carbs 35g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 327 % Daily Value * Total Fat 15g 19% Saturated Fat 5g 25% Cholesterol 189mg 63% Sodium 407mg 18% Total Carbohydrate 10g 4% Dietary Fiber 1g 3% Protein 35g 71% Calcium 38mg 3% Iron 2mg 9% Potassium 596mg 13% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Breaded Air Fryer Pork Chops 01 of 17 Photo by¬† DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS¬† 02 of 17 Photo by¬† RubyRoll5866 01/06/2025 This was so good and easy. I used a Mango Chipotle rub and 4 minutes each side for the thin pork chops. But one was much thicker than the others, and wasn't cooked through. Otherwise, awesome, and I don't even like pork chops. 03 of 17 Photo by¬† Angela C 05/23/2023 I used bone-in pork chops and panko bread crumbs and it came out great! üëç 04 of 17 Photo by¬† Nascha Ann Mahoney 09/02/2021 05 of 17 Photo by¬† Diane Faber Treadway 11/01/2020 2nd time. Yum 06 of 17 Photo by¬† Diane Faber Treadway 11/01/2020 2nd time. Yum 07 of 17 Photo by¬† Diane Faber Treadway 11/01/2020 2nd time. Yum 08 of 17 Photo by¬† mark 10/03/2020 Awesome easy to make. The chops I used were very thick for I had to cook for @ 20 mins but they turned out great! 09 of 17 Photo by¬† Leslie 03/30/2020 Delicious! I used seasoned croutons (what I had) and added Parmesan cheese. 10 of 17 Photo by¬† Sharon Dodge 02/19/2020 I love this recipe! I made it for my husband's birthday dinner and he loved them too. I did use smoked sweet paprika and added some basil. They are tender, juicy, and bursting with flavor in every bite. 1 2 Next You‚Äôll Also Love Air Fryer Pork Chops (No Breading) 12 Ratings Air Fryer Keto Pork Chops 11 Ratings Air Fryer Ranch Pork Chops 49 Ratings Keto Pecan-Crusted Pork Chops in the Air Fryer 8 Ratings Honey Mustard Pork Chops 274 Ratings Pluots and Pork 8 Ratings Air Fryer Prosciutto and Mozzarella Grilled Cheese 3 Ratings Air Fryer Chile Verde Burritos 1 Rating Air Fryer Breaded Sea Scallops 17 Ratings Easy Air Fryer Pork Chops 319 Ratings Tartar Sauce-Battered Fish Sticks in the Air Fryer 6 Ratings Air Fryer Keto Chicken Wings 6 Ratings Cajun Air Fryer Salmon 53 Ratings Pan-Fried Pork Chops with Sweet BBQ Sauce 13 Ratings Perfect Simple Roasted Pork Chops 20 Ratings Garlic-Seasoned Baked Pork Chops 204 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices ¬† Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith¬†publishing¬†family. name: France C

Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Pulse croutons in a small food processor until fine; transfer to a shallow dish. Lightly beat eggs in a separate shallow dish. Working one at a time, dip pork chops into beaten egg, letting excess drip off; press into crouton breading to coat both sides and place breaded chop, unstacked, onto a plate. Repeat with remaining chops. Mist chops with cooking spray. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray and arrange chops in a single layer in the air fryer basket. You may have to do two batches depending on the size of your air fryer.;Cook in the preheated air fryer for 5 minutes; flip chops and mist again with cooking spray if there are dry areas.
